backend

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.users.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an account for a xstreambackend.User. It is responsible for storing and retrieving a single users information. Any access errors are reported to caller.

      • getCredit

      • addCredit

        public int addCredit(double amount)
        This method is responsible for validating and a a user account from memory. It validates that amount does not violate any business constraints and deletes the user from memory.
        Parameters:
        amount - a double that represents the amount to remove from a Users account
        Returns:
        0 on success, 1 on failure, 2 on MaxAmountExceededError, 3 on MaxCreditLimitError

      • removeCredit

        public int removeCredit(double amount)
        This method is responsible for validating and removing credit from a user account. It validates that name exists on the system and the amount to be deducted is not greater than present amount .Any errors are reported to the caller function. If all business constraints are met it removes the amount of credit from the users account.
        Parameters:
        amount - a double that represents the amount to be deducted from a users account
        Returns:
        0 on success, 1 on failure, 2 AmountExceedsCreditError
